description: This file defines a route handler for the root index of a Remix-run based frontend application. It checks user authentication status via cookies and redirects accordingly; also includes a minimal React component for the index route.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Asynchronous loader function that inspects request cookies and redirects to either the app main page or login page based on authentication status.

methods.name: Index
methods.description: Default React component for the index route, returns null rendering.
